name: Guessing Game 2D
description:
This game is all about guessing the hints. Its my first game created using Unity C# and its a 2D game. On the future I will make better games like this for sure.

How to Download:

1. Go ahead download the ZIP file

2.Extract it.

3.Open "Guessing Game" Folder.

4.Run the "Terminal_Hacker_2D.exe" and enjoy.

You can also refer to "How to play Game.txt" to get advanced details to how to play the game. I hope you enjoyed it :)
